head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KELLY, AGNES C.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KELLY, AGNES C.

block.p: KELLY-Agnes C. On October 20, 2000. Devoted wife of the late Francis E. (Sgt.-NYPD). Beloved mother of Eileen Potash, Connie Leisenfelder, Patricia Smyth, Frank, Robert and Kathleen Malone. Cherished grandmother of 20. Dear great-grandmother of 17. Funeral Tuesday, 8:30 AM, from The Marine Park Funeral Home, 3024 Quentin Rd, Brooklyn, NY 11234. Mass Good Shepherd R.C. Church, 9:30 AM. Interment St. Charles Cemetery. Visiting hours 2-5 and 7-10 PM, Monday.
